mapper.select: select todo.tno, todo.tstartdate, todo.tcontent, todo.tenddate, todo.mno, todo.ttitle, todo.ttype, todo.bgcolor, todo.textcolor, todo.t_share, member.name from todo join member on(todo.mno = member.m_no) where todo.mno = #{mNo} union select todo.tno, todo.tstartdate, todo.tcontent, todo.tenddate, todo.mno, todo.ttitle, todo.ttype, todo.bgcolor, todo.textcolor, todo.t_share, member.name from todo join member on(todo.mno = member.name) where t_share='true'
mapper.update: update todo set tstartdate = #{start}, tenddate = #{end}, ttitle = #{title}, ttype = #{type}, bgcolor = #{backgroundColor}, TCONTENT = #{description}, t_share = #{share} where tno = #{tNo} and mno = #{mNo}
mapper.select: select * from todo where tstartdate like sysdate || '%' and mno = #{mNo} order by tstartdate desc
